Comment: This command info is generated from fig
Name: git-quick-stats
Description: Git quick statistics is a simple and efficient way to access various statistics in git repository

Arguments.Name: --help
Arguments.Description: Show help for git-quick-stats

Arguments.Name: --suggest-reviewers
Arguments.Description: Show the best people to contact to review code

Arguments.Name: --detailed-git-stats
Arguments.Description: Give a detailed list of git stats

Arguments.Name: ---git-stats-by-branch
Arguments.Description: Show detailed list of git stats by branch

Arguments.Name: --changelogs
Arguments.Description: Show changelogs

Arguments.Name: --changelogs-by-author
Arguments.Description: Show changelogs by author

Arguments.Name: --my-daily-stats
Arguments.Description: Show your current daily stats

Arguments.Name: --my-csv-output-by-branch-stats
Arguments.Description: Output daily stats by branch in CSV format

Arguments.Name: --json-output
Arguments.Description: Save git log as a JSON formatted file to a specified area

Arguments.Name: --branch-tree
Arguments.Description: Show an ASCII graph of the git repo branch history

Arguments.Name: --branches-by-date
Arguments.Description: Show branches by date

Arguments.Name: --contributors
Arguments.Description: See a list of everyone who contributed to the repo

Arguments.Name: --commits-per-author
Arguments.Description: Displays a list of commits per author

Arguments.Name: --commits-per-day
Arguments.Description: Displays a list of commits per day

Arguments.Name: --commits-by-month
Arguments.Description: Displays a list of commits per month

Arguments.Name: --commits-by-year
Arguments.Description: Displays a list of commits per year

Arguments.Name: --commits-by-weekday
Arguments.Description: Displays a list of commits per weekday

Arguments.Name: --commits-by-hour
Arguments.Description: Displays a list of commits per hour

Arguments.Name: --commits-by-author-by-hour
Arguments.Description: Displays a list of commits per hour by author

Arguments.Name: --commits-by-timezone
Arguments.Description: Displays a list of commits per timezone

Arguments.Name: --commits-by-author-by-timezone
Arguments.Description: Displays a list of commits per timezone by author
